description: The Deltas – warm, efficient, made to move – were created for climbing. Evolution and refinement have led to a versatile design ready for any mountain adventure. A great cold-weather midlayer – or standalone in milder temperatures – the stretchy Polartec® Power Dry® fleece’s voided grid construction delivers a high warmth to weight ratio and has a smooth face that layers easily under a shell. The ScubaHood™ fits under a helmet and integrates a panel that wears as a neck gaiter or balaclava.
name: Arcteryx Delta 1/2 Zip Hoody - Mens

specs.value: 9067 Power Dry Midwarmth grid backed jersey w
